questions.question_text_1: THIS IS QUESTION PAPER FOR THE SUBJECT "DEGREE LEVEL : LINEAR STATISTICAL MODELS" ARE YOU SURE YOU HAVE TO WRITE EXAM FOR THIS SUBJECT?
